languages.text: "Все, что тебе остается, мстить. Хотя даже это их не вернет".
"All you can do now is avenge them. But even that will not bring them back."
languages.original_text: "Все, что тебе остается, мстить. Хотя даже это их не вернет".

traits.locale_text: "All you can do now is avenge them. But even that will not bring them back."
"All you can do now is avenge them. But even that will not bring them back."
"All you can do now is avenge them. But even that will not bring them back."
"All you can do now is avenge them. But even that will not bring them back."

languages.text: “你现在唯一能做的事情，就是为他们报仇。但即便如此，他们也回不来了。”
languages.original_text: "All you can do now is avenge them. But even that will not bring them back."

traits.locale_text: “你现在唯一能做的事情，就是为他们报仇。但即便如此，他们也回不来了。”

languages.text: «Lo único que puede hacer es vengarlos. Aunque eso no haga que vuelvan a la vida».
languages.original_text: "All you can do now is avenge them. But even that will not bring them back."

traits.locale_text: «Lo único que puede hacer es vengarlos. Aunque eso no haga que vuelvan a la vida».

languages.text: 「お前にできることは復讐だけだ。だが、それすらも彼らを蘇らせるわけじゃあない」
languages.original_text: "All you can do now is avenge them. But even that will not bring them back."

traits.locale_text: 「お前にできることは復讐だけだ。だが、それすらも彼らを蘇らせるわけじゃあない」

languages.text: "Ihr könnt nichts anderes tun, als sie zu rächen. Doch selbst das bringt sie nicht zurück."
languages.original_text: "All you can do now is avenge them. But even that will not bring them back."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könnt nichts anderes tun, als sie zu rächen. Doch selbst das bringt sie nicht zurück."

languages.text: « Il n'y a rien que vous puissiez faire à part venger leur mort. Mais y parvenir ne les ramènera pas à la vie. »
languages.original_text: "All you can do now is avenge them. But even that will not bring them back."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'y a rien que vous puissiez faire à part venger leur mort. Mais y parvenir ne les ramènera pas à la vie. »

languages.text: "Şimdi tek yapabileceğin, onların intikamını almak. Fakat intikam onları geri getirmeyecek."
languages.original_text: "All you can do now is avenge them. But even that will not bring them back."

traits.locale_text: "Şimdi tek yapabileceğin şey, onların intikamını almak. Fakat intikam, onları geri getirmeyecek."
